Title: Relates to requiring a full paid work day off for registered voters on certain election days
Summary: Provides all registered voters on the day of the general election and the primary election in every even numbered year a full work day off without the loss of pay; provides a tax credit to small businesses who provide a paid day off to employees on general election day.
LawCode: Amd §3-110, El L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring a full paid work day off for registered voters on certain election days; and to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit for certain small businesses
